title: Ever since I understood the importance
header: Ever since I understood the importance
meta_content: Tithing and giving is more than just a legalistic old testament comandment, it is a principle in which J. Woods of Nevada saw God bless them through!
content:
Ever since I understood the importance of tithing and living to give, I have been blessed with raises and promotions. I have just skipped over a position at work to a higher paying position with more responsibility. It's exactly the job I asked for and I tell everyone at work it's because of Jesus. I thank God for the principles I have learned from Pastor Tom's teachings on prosperity. J. Woods
Reno, NV
